RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 15600. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CURIOSITY KILLS dueled on the lead from the inside, drifted out and gained a clear lead in the stretch, remained clear late under firm handling. IRON WILMA was never far back, rallied three wide in the stretch and was up for place. SPECIAL ASSISTANT allowed to settle early, saved ground and finished willingly. SOULSTONE allowed to settle, saved ground and was no threat. HOPS PETUNIA had good early speed, and tired in mid stretch. FRANCIA (PER) contended early three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground and was no threat,

ENTRY.COMMENT: was never far back, rallied, three wide and was up for place

ENTRY.COMMENT: contended early three wide and was through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 9 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAGTIME DOLLY was never far back on the inside, angled out three wide on the far turn, closed determinedly and drew clear late under left handed urging SPECIAL BEACH was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was hooked at the quarter pole, held grudgingly and was second best. CURT'S ANGEL pressed the pace throughout and went evenly late. GENERAL GINNY never far back, was no threat late. ANNMARIA had good position on the inside and lacked a late response.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIAM'S QUALITY was off slowly and rushed up down the backside on the inside to reach contention, rallied at the quarter pole on the rail and drew even, drew off in the stretch under left handed urging to win going away. SISTER CODE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was hooked at the quarter pole, could not match strides late with the winner but held place. DANZING CHICK contended throughout and finished evenly late on the inside. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN had good position early while three wide and lacked a late response. DUDE'S MIST DATE allowed to settle, failed to menace. JUMP INTO SANITY was outrun.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RADIANTRITHYM had good position early on the inside, angled out three wide in the stretch, had a late burst and was up in the last jump. SHELLEY'S GEM dueled on the lead for a half, shook clear in the stretch, remained clear late and was caught the last jump. COWGIRL KIMMIE dueled on the lead for a half, then weakened in the stretch. ACCOLADES GALORE never far back, lacked a late response. KAY BEE GEE had good position on the inside and tired in mid stretch. BACKSPLASH was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 9 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races W here Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THRU THE VINE was well placed on the inside, awaited room on the turn and angled out six wide, had a late rally and drew off late under firm handling. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK was never far back, rallied in the stretch and drew even was outfinished late but held place. UNCLE CHARMING dueled on the lead throughout and held well in the stretch. RIVERBOAT GAMBLER pressed the early pace three wide, dueled around the turn and until late stretch and weakened slightly. FALCONS FURY dueled early and gradually weakened. IT'S YOUR CALL allowed to settle, failed to menace. VISUAL MISSION was outrun. OL' L B contended early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 9 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAV'S BOO was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch, split horses and drew clear under strong handling. AWESOMELY SHY dueled on the lead for a half, shook clear in the stretch, was outfinished late but held place CALTHA was never far back, rallied on the inside and finished well. ROSE KNOWS raced mid pack, swung five wide and had a late gain. BOURBONWITHGINGER was well placed early rallied four wide and hung late. SKY allowed to settle early, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. PURDY PUMKIN was off slowly, saved ground and was no menace. MIMAJOON dueled early and was through after a half.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ORLEANS STORM vied for lead throughout, drew clear late, driving. GRANDE RED dueled with the winner, was outfinished late but held place. RUNAWAY RUSSELL had good position throughout and finished willingly. NOSEY POWER had good position three wide and needed more late. ANIMO ROBERTO was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and closed a gap. SPLENDID SPIRIT was off slowly and was no threat. MY TICKET contended early while between horses and faded. CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS was no factor. DANES HEART was outrun.
